abilities.name: Sniper Shot
abilities.description: Deals 400 (+50% AD) damage. After use, gain 20% crit chance for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Hiding
abilities.description: Become untargetable for 2 turns and regenerate 350 HP each turn. Farmer farmer_nina can still be damaged by AOE and DOT effects. Stealth breaks if damaged or when using other abilities.

abilities.name: Target Lock
abilities.description: Marks a target, causing them to take 15% more physical damage for 10 turns.

abilities.name: Piercing Shot
abilities.description: Fires a specialized round that deals 750 (+250% AD) physical damage and completely ignores the target's armor.

passive.name: Evasive Adaptability
passive.description: Nina gains 5% dodge chance for each buff active on her.
